Title: Vengeance: The True Story of an Israeli Counter-Terrorist Team
Content: George Jonaswas born in Budapest, Hungary, in 1935. Following the Hungarian uprising of 1956, he emigrated to Canada. In addition to fourteen books, three of which have become national and international bestsellers, Jonas has written forThe Wall Street Journal, The Chicago Sun-Times,and other publications. In 1978, he won the Edgar Allan Poe Award for Best True Crime.--This text refers to thePaperbackedition....
